attributes.action: Having a Driving License is a privilege not a right, abuse it, you lose it - FOR LIFE
attributes.additional_details:
If you drink and drive, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you drive uninsured, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you drive untaxed, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you flee from the Police in a vehicle, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you kill someone whilst driving a car when negligent, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you cause life altering injuries to someone whilst driving a car when negligent, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
If you steal a car, you forfeit your License FOR LIFE.
I think you get the idea....
